document_data.name: House Implement Wholesalers
document_data.mainbody: '''House Implement Wholesalers''' was a wide-reaching and well-regarded [[quasimagical item]] factory and shop that operated in the [[enclave]] of [[Eileanar]] until its destruction in {{yearlinkConvert|3520|NY}}.
document_data.Services: The business was co-owned and operated by the [[priest]]s [[Babylas]], [[Clement]], and [[Cogan]]. The top four floors of the five-story building were dedicated to the magical workshops of the artisans who produced the wide array of quasimagical items that were sold. They specialized in relatively simple, everyday items of convenience that made life more comfortable for the enclave-dwelling [[Netherese]], ranging from small portable devices to massive, heavy fixtures. Their most popular items for sale included the ''[[hot waterpipe]]'', ''[[ice box]]'', ''[[music box (Netherese)|music box]]'', ''[[Stoker's pit]]'', ''[[Stoker's veritable pit]]'', and ''[[water pipe]]''.
